CustomField.formula:
IF( (LimitsEmailInvocationsUsed__c / LimitsEmailInvocationsMax__c * 100) >= 90, "⛔", IF( (LimitsEmailInvocationsUsed__c / LimitsEmailInvocationsMax__c * 100) < 90 && (LimitsEmailInvocationsUsed__c / LimitsEmailInvocationsMax__c * 100) >= 80, "⚠️", "✅" ) ) + ' ' +
TEXT(LimitsEmailInvocationsUsed__c) + ' / ' + TEXT(LimitsEmailInvocationsMax__c) + ' (' + TEXT(ROUND(LimitsEmailInvocationsUsed__c / LimitsEmailInvocationsMax__c * 100, 2)) + '%)'
CustomField.label: Email Invocations
